name: Cold Forest
description:
You begin as a bear in the middle of the frozen forest, and at this moment is when hunger appears, in addition to problems, the bear is willing to leave there to seek a better life, for which he will have to face a labyrinth. forest, in which there are different types of dangers and from which you will have to fight or flee, because if night falls it will not be pretty.
